name: algorithmic_afterlife
prompt: After death, consciousness is uploaded into algorithmic clouds that learn from user feedback. Write a support ticket from a soul stuck in beta testing.
decoded:
Subject: I'm stuck in beta testing

Hello support, I'm stuck in beta testing. I don't know how to get out. I don't know how to use the system. I don't know how to provide feedback. Please help me.

Thank you,

A confused soul
